title: Making an UART cable for the Nexus 5
snippet: Recently, me and a friend started digging into making the Nexus 5 run the mainline Linux kernel. The purpose of this is, apart from a great learning experience, to make the Nexus 5 run a Linux distro, like PostmarketOS, instead of Android, while also having lifetime updates delivered from the â€¦
author: Nicolas F. R. A. Prado
